What's Changed
feat: Add keyboard shortcuts for the desktop client.
feat: Introduce "Instruction Injection" feature, which replaces the previous "Learning Mode".
feat: Add a system tray menu for quick access (desktop).
feat: Allow resetting the default model to its original setting.
feat: Allow setting custom avatars for providers.
feat: Add the ability to move conversations between different assistants.
feat: Add support for uploading video files (for models with video input capabilities).
feat: Introduce Image OCR (Optical Character Recognition) functionality.
feat: Add a setting for automatic word wrap in code blocks (mobile only).
feat: Add an assistant_name variable available in the system prompt.
fix: Resolve an issue where non-streaming chat mode could not be enabled correctly.
fix: Addressed several other known bugs to improve stability.
perf: Implemented lazy loading for system fonts to reduce memory consumption.
refactor: Optimized code block functionality and user experience.
refactor: Polished and improved several UI pages.
